TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XhtmlTextWriter extends System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter

summary.span: 将特定于可扩展超文本标记语言 (XHTML) 的字符（包括从 XTHML 派生的 XHTML 模块的所有变体）写入移动设备的 ASP.NET 服务器控件的输出流。

span.span: Writes Extensible Hypertext Markup Language (XHTML)-specific characters, including all variations of XHTML modules that derive from XTHML, to the output stream for an ASP.NET server control for mobile devices.

summary.span: 重写 类以为 ASP.NET 页和服务器控件提供自定义 XHTML 呈现。

span.span: Override the class to provide custom XHTML rendering for ASP.NET pages and server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XHTML 是一个 XML 符合的标记语言，基于 HTML 4.1，允许你创建适合于多个设备类型的网站。XHTML is an XML-compliant markup language, based on HTML 4.1, which allows you to create Web sites that are suitable for multiple device types. 它将结合使用 HTML 附带提供的 XML，以形成一种标记语言与各种格式和样式选项，以及减少了的标记多义性的严格元素准则的易用性。It merges the ease of use provided by HTML with the strict element guidelines provided by XML to produce a markup language with a wide range of format and style options, and with reduced markup tag ambiguity. 类提供 ASP.NET 服务器控件使用客户端向呈现 XHTML 内容时的格式设置功能。The class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering XHTML content to clients. 你可以使用方法，以指定哪种类型的 XHTML 文本编写器呈现。You can use the method to specify which type of XHTML the text writer renders. 支持的文档类型定义中枚举。Supported document types are defined in the enumeration. 类呈现两个集的元素的属性。The class renders two sets of attributes for elements. 一组是通用的属性，作为中引用的集合属性。One set is a collection of common attributes, as referenced in the property. 第二组是特定于元素的特性，如中引用的集合属性。The second set is a collection of element-specific attributes, as referenced in the property. 元素和呈现的样式的详细信息，请参阅 XHTML 模块化以外规范在[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on the elements and styles that are rendered, see the XHTML modularization specification at the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 你可以使用的成员类和任何派生的类，以创建自定义文本编写器，用于自定义 XHTML 页适配器或类适配器。You can use the members of the class and any derived classes to create custom text writers to use in custom XHTML page adapters or class adapters. 你还可以创建重写的标准行为的派生的类类。You can also create derived classes that override the standard behavior of the class. 默认情况下，当你正在使用的浏览器支持 HTML 4.0 ASP.NET 页面和控件呈现兼容 XHTML 1.1 标准的标记。By default, when you are working with browsers that support HTML 4.0, ASP.NET pages and controls render markup that is compatible with the XHTML 1.1 standard. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). 输出 XHTML，除非你将配置 ASP.NET 专门用于不呈现 XHTML 标记。The outputs XHTML unless you configure ASP.NET specifically to not render XHTML markup. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 配置 XHTML 呈现在 ASP.NET 网站](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149)。For more information, see [NIB: How to: Configure XHTML Rendering in ASP.NET Web Sites](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149). ## Examples 本部分中的代码示例包含四个部分。The code example in this section contains four parts. 第一个示例演示如何创建派生的类。The first example demonstrates how to create a derived class. 第二个代码示例演示如何创建自定义控件。The second code example demonstrates how to create a custom control. 第三个代码示例演示如何使用自定义控件。The third code example demonstrates how to use the custom control. 第四个代码示例提供了运行自定义控件所需的代码。The fourth code example provides the code that is required to run the custom control. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom class that is derived from the class. 它有两个构造函数，这是标准的所有类的直接或间接继承自类。It has two constructors, which is standard for all classes that inherit directly or indirectly from the class. 第一个构造函数采用对象作为参数并调用第二个构造函数，并传递以下两个参数值：The first constructor takes a object as a parameter and calls the second constructor, passing the following two parameter values: - 实例。The instance. - 值属性，定义 XHTML 文本编写器使用的默认行缩进。The value of the property, which defines the default line indentation that is used by the XHTML text writer. 此代码示例还演示如何重写和方法若要筛选的文本大小和颜色样式，分别。This code example also shows how to override the and methods to filter for text size and color style, respectively. 此外，它将重写和方法来写入文本字符串之前和之后呈现控件。Additionally, it overrides the and methods to write a text string before and after a control has rendered. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/CS/customxhtmltextwriter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/VB/customxhtmltextwriter.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义控件名为`TestLabel`和名为的自定义适配器`XhtmlTestLabelAdapter`呈现为 XHTML 控件的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control named `TestLabel` and a custom adapter named `XhtmlTestLabelAdapter` that renders the content of the control as XHTML. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/xhtmltextlabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/xhtmltestlabel.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用自定义控件`TestLabel`ASP.NET 网页上。The following code example demonstrates how to use the custom control `TestLabel` on an ASP.NET Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/xhtmltextlabel.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/xhtmltestlabel.aspx#4)] 若要在前面的代码示例使用自定义控件，添加以下``元素为两个文件之一。To use the custom control in the preceding code example, add the following `` element to one of two files. 你可以将其添加到特定的浏览器中，相应计算机范围文件的子目录中作为.NET Framework 配置目录的子文件夹。You can add it to the appropriate machine-wide file in the subdirectory for a specific browser, as a subfolder of the .NET Framework configuration directory. 或者，可以将其添加到 Web 应用程序根目录下 App_Browsers 目录中的自定义浏览器文件。Alternatively, you can add it to a custom browser file in the App_Browsers directory under the Web application root. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数采用对象作为参数调用第二个构造函数，并传递两个参数值：The constructor that takes a object as a parameter calls the second constructor, passing two parameter values: - 实例。The instance. - 中指定的字符串值字段，它定义 XHTML 文本编写器使用的选项卡间距。The string value that is specified in the field, which defines the tab spacing that is used by the XHTML text writer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建两个构造函数，这是标准的所有类的直接或间接派生从类，用于自定义类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates how to create the two constructors, which is standard for all classes that derive directly or indirectly from the class, for a custom class that is derived from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将属性添加到 XHTML 元素。Use the method to add an attribute to an XHTML element. 添加的属性然后可以识别并由呈现对象。The added attribute can then be recognized and rendered by the object. 若要防止编写器呈现 XHTML 元素的公共属性，使用方法。To prevent the writer from rendering a common attribute of an XHTML element, use the method.

value.span: 一个包含公共特性的 对象。

span.span: A object containing common attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合包含的特性，可以用 XHTML 元素在和中没有取消属性。The collection contains attributes that are allowed in XHTML elements and that are not suppressed in the property. 有关常见属性的详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on common attributes, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 新实例时创建类，将初始化的常见属性：When a new instance of the class is created, the common attributes that are initialized are: - `class` - `id` - `title` - `xml:lang`

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用方法将添加识别 XHTML 元素属性。Use the method to add recognized attributes to an XHTML element. 若要删除 XHTML 元素上的公共属性，使用方法。To remove common attributes on an XHTML element, use the method. 新实例时创建类，使用下表中所示的属性填充的特定元素的属性的对象。When a new instance of the class is created, the object of element-specific attributes is populated with the attributes shown in the following table. |元素Element|特性Attributes| |-------------|----------------| |``|`accesskey`, `href`, `charset`, `hreflang`, `rel`, `type`, `rev`, `title`, `tabindex``accesskey`, `href`, `charset`, `hreflang`, `rel`, `type`, `rev`, `title`, `tabindex`| |``|`href`| |`
`|`cite`| |`
`|`id`, `class`, `title``id`, `class`, `title`| |`
`|`action`, `method`, `enctype``action`, `method`, `enctype`| |``|`xml:lang`| |``|`version`, `xml:lang`, `xmlns``version`, `xml:lang`, `xmlns`| |``|`src`, `alt`, `width`, `longdesc`, `height``src`, `alt`, `width`, `longdesc`, `height`| |``|`size`, `accesskey`, `title`, `name`, `type`, `disabled`, `value`, `src`, `checked`, `maxlength`, `tabindex``size`, `accesskey`, `title`, `name`, `type`, `disabled`, `value`, `src`, `checked`, `maxlength`, `tabindex`| |`

summary.span: 检查一个 XHTML 特性以确保它可以在 元素的开始标记中呈现。

span.span: Checks an XHTML attribute to ensure that it can be rendered in the opening tag of a element.

returns.span: 如果特性可以应用于 元素，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the attribute can be applied to a element; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法可用于有条件地呈现具体取决于是否支持请求的设备的 XHTML 文档类型的属性。This method is useful to conditionally render an attribute depending on whether it is supported by the XHTML document type of the requesting device. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个更大的示例创建一个自定义的一部分控制和呈现的控件作为 XHTML 内容的适配器。The following code example is part of a larger example that creates a custom control and an adapter that renders the content of the control as XHTML. 此代码示例演示如何创建一个名为的布尔变量`attTest`并将其设置为调用得到的结果的返回值带有参数值"样式"方法。This code example demonstrates how to create a Boolean variable named `attTest` and set it to the return value that results from calling the method with the parameter value "style". 如果方法返回`true`，与控件关联的样式呈现使用和方法。If the method returns `true`, the styles that are associated with the control are rendered using the and methods. 如果`attTest`值是`false`，不会呈现的样式。If the `attTest` value is `false`, the styles are not rendered. 相反，页面将显示该控件的文本`
`由呈现的元素方法，并告知用户已有条件地呈现控件的 XHTML 内容的文本字符串。Instead, the page displays the text for the control, a `
` element that is rendered by the method, and a text string informing the user that the XHTML content of the control has rendered conditionally. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/xhtmltextlabel.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/xhtmltestlabel.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法来检查是否`size`属性呈现任何由此文本编写器呈现的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to check whether a `size` attribute is rendered for any of the elements that are rendered by this text writer. 如果`size`呈现属性，代码将检查其值是否为 8 磅。If a `size` attribute is rendered, the code checks whether its value is 8 point. 如果是这样，方法返回`true`，它使该属性，其值来呈现。If so, the method returns `true`, allowing the attribute and its value to render. 如果值为 8 点以外方法返回`false`，并且该属性，但不呈现其值。If the value is other than 8 point, the method returns `false`, and the attribute and its value are not rendered. 如果按键参数的方法不匹配属性的基本功能调用方法时中, 定义类。If the key parameter of the method does not match the attribute, the base functionality of the method is called, as defined in the class. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/CS/customxhtmltextwriter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/VB/customxhtmltextwriter.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法来检查是否属性呈现任何由此文本编写器呈现的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to check whether a attribute is being rendered for any of the elements that are rendered by this text writer. 如果呈现属性，代码将检查其值是否为紫色。If a attribute is rendered, the code checks whether its value is purple. 如果值为紫色，方法返回`false`并且该属性，但不呈现其值。If the value is purple, the method returns `false` and the attribute and its value are not rendered. 如果属性设置为任何其他值，方法返回`true`和呈现属性及其值。If the attribute is set to any other value, the method returns `true` and the attribute and its value are rendered. 如果按键参数的方法不匹配属性的基本功能调用方法时中, 定义类。If the key parameter of the method does not match the attribute, the base functionality of the method is called, as defined in the class. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/CS/customxhtmltextwriter.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/VB/customxhtmltextwriter.vb#3)]

summary.span: 指定文本编写器要呈现到页或控件的 XHTML 文档类型。

span.span: Specifies the XHTML document type for the text writer to render to the page or control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用XHTML 你想要呈现到请求的设备的类型定义的自定义页适配器中的方法。Use the method in a custom page adapter to define the type of XHTML that you want to render to the requesting device. 支持的文档类型定义中枚举。Supported document types are defined in the enumeration.

.property instance class System.Collections.Hashtable SuppressCommonAttributes
Protected ReadOnly Property SuppressCommonAttributes As Hashtable
protected: property System::Collections::Hashtable ^ SuppressCommonAttributes { System::Collections::Hashtable ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取由取消了 特性的元素组成的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object of elements for which attributes are suppressed.

value.span: 元素的 ，其中包含未呈现的 的集合。

span.span: A of elements containing a collection of that are not rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 禁止显示的属性集合为其包含的 XHTML 元素列表属性不会呈现。The suppressed attribute collection includes a list of XHTML elements for which attributes are not rendered. 新实例时创建类，对象的元素组成的禁止特性包括：When a new instance of the class is created, the object of elements for which attributes are suppressed includes: - `base` - `meta` - `br` - `head` - `title` - `html` - `style`

summary.span: 将 元素写入 XHTML 输出流。

span.span: Writes a element to the XHTML output stream.

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承方法写入的文本字符串方法和一个`
`具有元素方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the inherited method to write a text string with the method and a `
` element with the method.
